thread.title: Three more Lehigh County farms are preserved under Pennsylvania program
thread.title_full: Three more Lehigh County farms are preserved under Pennsylvania program

author: Evan Jones
title: Three more Lehigh County farms are preserved under Pennsylvania program
text:
Local News SUBSCRIBER ONLY Local News | 3 more Lehigh Valley farms saved from development. Find out where Share this: Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Click to share on X (Opens in new window) A farm in Lynn Township is among the latest to be preserved from development thanks to a state program. (Morning Call file photo) By Evan Jones | ejones@mcall.com | The Morning Call UPDATED: December 26, 2024 at 5:07 PM EST The Lehigh County farms preserved in this round had a total investment of $1.3 million, including $779,405 from the state, $477,315 from the county, $2,002 from Lynn Township and $52,693 from North Whitehall Township.
